name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fruity PNG - Bing Image Creator Companion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fruity PNG adds a PNG download button to the upper-right corner of the large version of Bing Image Creator results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fruity PNG adds PNG and JPEG download buttons to the upper-right corner of the large version of Bing Image Creator results. Right-click the button and copy the link to get the Base64 encoded resource, or click the button to download the PNG or JPEG.
